value:
$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|We need to win this one. Otherwise
the Shepherds won't get any
presents. That's why we're here!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|You're right. As soon as we get home,
we'll be stuffing their stockings with
gifts...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|You may know your way around the
battlefield, but I have crafted some
strategies specifically for this festival.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_WinterFes17,Face|If you defeat us, I'll curse your
children, their children, and their
children's children...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|Here we go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|You win. We'll have to devise another
strategy for filling everyone's
stockings.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hooray! We did it!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Good. Where's the prize? I'm hoping
it's quality gems or expensive
clothing...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|No idea. Maybe we should try taking
a look in this sack.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And we've lost them... Haven't we,
$Nu?$k$pWe won't hear a thing out of them
but the tournament prizes for a
while, at least...$k$pThat reminds me—do you know
anything about why we give presents
at the winter festival?$k$pAccording to legend, the one who
delivered the presents originally set
out on a search for a gift—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, my... Commander Anna, take a
look at this! There really are gems
in here!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Fantastic! This should keep the Order
of Heroes' larder stocked through the
end of the winter, at least!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Er, yes... Well, I'm just glad that
everyone gets to enjoy the festival
together.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse! You should try on this outfit!
Red suits you, I think...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|If that's what it takes... OK, Sharena!$k$pShall we join them for a stroll? Hmm,
$Nu?$k$p$Sbs150|
